meanings.definition: Substances produced by an organism that are toxic to itself.
meanings.sent1: The autotoxins released by the plant caused harm to its own cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied how autotoxins affect the growth of certain organisms.
meanings.sent3: The autotoxins decided to have a party, but no one else was invited!
meanings.sent4: The autotoxins were like a double-edged sword, protecting the plant but also causing damage.
meanings.sent5: The plant's autotoxins acted like a self-destruct button, harming itself.

meanings.definition: Toxic compounds that are generated within an organism.
meanings.sent1: The accumulation of autotoxins in the body led to negative health effects.
meanings.sent2: It is important to understand how autotoxins can impact an organism's well-being.
meanings.sent3: The autotoxins in the body started a rebellion against the organism!
meanings.sent4: The autotoxins spread through the organism like a silent poison, causing harm.
meanings.sent5: The organism struggled to rid itself of the harmful autotoxins invading its system.
